main event: A civilian observed a silvery white object in the sky that was hovering upward and then appeared as a dome. The object had the characteristics of a balloon.
interesting points: The object was hovering upward before appearing as a dome.
The observer noted there was a bright moonlight, which may have helped illuminate the balloon.
All the characteristics of a balloon were present in the information provided.
The observer stated the object was silvery white in color.
The sighting lasted for about 6 minutes.
